item.title: Certification
item.description: IBM Python Essentials This certificate was about Python Essentials and essentialy Data Science. I learned Python Data Science Libraries. Embedded Systems It was a essential embedded system course based on C programming language. There was some essentials subjects such as if statement, loop statements. Also there was a little bit more complex structures like finite program structure.

item.title: TESOL Certification
item.description: Tesol Certification" Tesol Certification Content I took this certification from Arizona State University. I took some courses as followings: Foundational Principles Theories of Second Language Acquisition Lesson Design and Assessment Teaching Reading, Writing, and Grammar Teaching Listening, Speaking, and Pronunciation Technology-Enriched Teaching I had abservation 10 hours and also teach 10 hours
